request.initial: This is a Turnstile message. You will recieve an alert when it is your turn. Reply with 1 to confirmm 2 to cancel.

response.confirm: You have confirmed your turn. You will recieve an alert when it is your turn.
response.cancel: You have cancelled your turn. You will no longer recieve alerts.
response.wrong_response:
Invalid response. Valid responses are 
 - 1 to confirm 
 - 2 to cancel

matching_responses.1: You have confirmed your turn. You will recieve an alert when it is your turn.
matching_responses.2: You have cancelled your turn. You will no longer recieve alerts.
